pages.text: Not only is Corn a great staple crop, but it is the single most reliable source of Ethanol when put into the $(l:patchouli:electric_machines/fermenter)Industrial Fermenter$().$(br)Corn Kernels, which can be planted, can be obtained by finding Wild Corn in the world. Maize can also be used to sustain farm animals.

Industrial Hemp is a remarkable plant! Not only are its seeds useful for the the creation of $(l:patchouli:electric_machines/refinery)Biodiesel$(), the hemp fibers are also used for the creation of Tough Fabric, which can be used for insulating wires, among other uses.$(br)The seeds can be obtained by breaking tall grass.
